title.narrative: Borders for All 1 - enhancing border security on the Tunisian and Algeria borders through community engagement approaches to security

description.narrative: Borders for All 1 - enhancing border security on the Tunisian and Algeria borders through community engagement approaches to security

The aim of the project is that Tunisian border management strategies and senior officials make use of community engagement approaches in order to improve border security. The project aimed to achieve this through an integrated approach involving: research, training and capacity building, advocacy and policy influencing, and learning through evidence gathered from practical application of community engagement approaches, and pilot initiatives.
